channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The British Airways Killer
channel.desc: The first part of a two-part documentary series. Halloween 2010 - Britain is rocked by the disappearance of Joanna Simpson, a wealthy heiress and mother of two from Ascot. S1 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Katie is joined by comedian Laura Smyth for some belly dancing, Michael and Gen transform another charity founder, and Aldo Zilli serves up delicious mocktails. S1 Ep15.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Good Mood Food
channel.desc: Nuts and Seeds: Nuts and seeds take centre stage in all of Ainsley's dishes this time, and they include trofie pasta with a pistachio and mint pesto that is a taste of Sicily. S2 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
channel.desc: Joining Alan this time are Brian Conley, Corrie legend Thelma Barlow, and DIY expert Wayne Perrey to upcycle an old dresser into a potting station for the greenhouse.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Jimmy and Shivi's Farmhouse Breakfast
channel.desc: Russell Watson: Classical singer Russell Watson joins Jimmy and Shivi for food and fun as Shivi serves up a Thai breakfast and Jimmy visits a local college. S2 Ep16.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
channel.desc: James is this time joined at home in Hampshire by The Supervet star Noel Fitzpatrick and dishes from chefs Ryan and Liam Simpson-Trotman, Sabrina Gidda, and Tony Singh. S8 Ep11.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: John and Lisa's Weekend Kitchen
channel.desc: John and Lisa present four restaurant-quality meals - including Lisa's favourite butter chicken and sticky toffee pudding madeleines - that are easily recreated at home. S10 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Racing Glorious Goodwood
channel.desc: Ed Chamberlin and Francesca Cumani present coverage of the fifth and final day of Glorious Goodwood 2025 - and action from Newmarket - with highlights including the Stewards' Cup.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz as superstar Bonnie Langford is joined by sporting legend Matt Dawson and comedian Geoff Norcott in a bid to win 20,000 pounds for charity.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: The celebrities are cast out to sea, Lucy has a moving encounter with the endangered great hammerhead shark, and Lenny opens up to Ade about his motives for being here. S1 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: One Chaser is all that stands between actress Catherine Tyldesley, entrepreneur Levi Roots, comedian Chris McCausland, rock legend Rick Wakeman and thousands of pounds for charity. S12 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The 1% Club
channel.desc: Lee Mack hosts the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where the questions have nothing to do with remembering facts and where 100 contestants aim to win up to 100,000 pounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Spectre
channel.desc: Bond film starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz, 2015. 007 receives a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a clandestine criminal organisation called SPECTRE.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.
